name: Bott
description:
Hello!
Bott is a 2D platform game where we'll control a little robot who wants to collect 5 keys to open the door of his friend IceBott's igloo.
-Jump, run and explore 5 short levels. 
-Look for all the hidden robots. 
-Defeat boredom in a short game of no more than 10 minutes.
Controls
 A: interact
 B: jump 
Start: pause
Important! 
To play you will need an emulator (PC, phone and some consoles) or a Game Boy console with an emulation cartridge.
The game has the option to be played in color.
